oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Memphis 2000 Historical Calendar
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Memphis, Tennessee; history; calendars;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A 2000 calendar with historical facts for each day of the year. Includes biographical information on John Christmas McLemore, Joseph Edison Walker, Frances Wright, Lucie E. Campbell, Abe Plough, Tom Lee, Clarence Saunders, Miles Vandahurst Lynk, Suzanne Conlon Scruggs, Emma Currin Wilburn, Edward Hull Crump, and Robert R. Church, Jr.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Arthur L. Webb, Christina N. Webb, Christin L. Webb
